    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Gorišče in preslikava točke</string>
            <string language="en">Focal Point and Image Point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerpunkt und Bild-Punkt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Point focal et point d'image</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponto focal e ponto da imagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punto focale e punto di immagine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημείο εστίασης και σημείο εικόνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Punto focal y punta de la imagen</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gorišče in preslikava točke pri ukrivljenem zrcalu (konkavnem in konveksnem).</string>
            <string language="en">Focal point and point translation in case of curved mirror (convex and concave).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ukrivljeno zrcalo</string>
            <string language="en">curved mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zrcalo</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerpunkt und Punktübersetzung falls von 
gebogenem Spiegel (konvex und konkav).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Point focal et traduction de point en cas de 
miroir incurvé (convexe et concave).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponto focal e tradução do ponto caso que do 
espelho curvado (convexo e côncavo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punto focale e traduzione del punto nel caso 
dello specchio curvo (convesso e concavo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημείο εστίασης και μετάφραση σημείου σε περίπτωση 
κυρτού καθρέφτη (κυρτός και κοίλος).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Punto focal y traducción de la punta en caso de 
que del espejo curvado (convexo y cóncavo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gebogener Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir incurvé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho curvado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
